title: Zapf interviews
content:
I am searching for any known interviews with Hermann Zapf. I'm doing a project about him and i need more information.   
   
thanks to all
author: anonymous

comments.content: Thanks John for the link. Unfortunately I already had found that information. I appreciate the help.

[Zapf's own biographical sketch](http://web.archive.org/web/20131019161658/http:/www.fontexplorer.com/FontStore?URL=http://www.fontexplorer.com/isroot/FontStore/content/01_news/content/news_04b_fontfeat_arch/news_04b_fontfeat_zapf/news_04b_fontf_z_school.html) at Linotype Library GmbH.
